I am in need of a website for easy color picking and color scheme creation which give me the answer in hex-codes?
Adobe Color (https://color.adobe.com/create) is a powerful tool for creating and sharing color schemes. It allows you to explore color harmonies, adjust color values, and provides hex-codes.
How do TailwindCSS work and what can I do with it? Describe in two sentences.

TailwindCSS is a utility-first CSS framework that provides pre-defined CSS classes to rapidly build responsive user interfaces. It allows developers to easily customize and extend their designs by composing small utility classes rather than writing complex custom CSS rules.
